news.title: Centralised Exchange (CEX) Support Available on MMI
news.subtitle: MetaMask Institutional continues to expand on-chain data access and now offers support to all EVM networks

image.title: Centralised (CEX) Exchange Support Now Available on MMI

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Crypto Funds, Crypto VCs, DAOs, and traditional organisations must monitor, manage and report on their digital assets. However, managing assets across multiple platforms remains a challenge. From the challenges of combining on-chain data across EVM Networks, to alternative Layer-1 networks whilst incorporating centralised exchange data. That’s why MetaMask Institutional (MMI), specialises in on-chain data.

We have created an industry standard for DeFi data and today are excited to now offer the ability to transact, monitor, manage and report across all EVMs.

Constantly improving access to on-chain data for MMI users

We offer rich and in-depth DeFi profit and loss and performance data, snapshot valuations and transaction history through our Portfolio Dashboard interface and our API suite. Over the last year, we have not only expanded the depth and breadth of our EVM data but also expanded to Solana and are excited to share that Bitcoin support has also been added.

As we continue to expand support to other non-EVM L1’s, we also wanted to ensure we cover off-chain data and in April of this year, we announced our MeshConnect integration.

To use Andrew Chen’s cold start problem as a metaphor, we started with the “hard side of the network”. On-chain data is one of our many core areas of expertise and is one of the most challenging problems to solve at scale.

With Mesh, we offer organisations the ability to connect their Centralised Exchange data into our consolidated Portfolio Dashboard, which shows all their holdings in one intuitive interface. Users can connect their Coinbase Prime, Binance Institutional and OKX Institutional accounts. We will shortly be adding a range of additional Pro, Prime and Institutional accounts from additional centralised exchanges.

How to add an centralised exchange to your MMI Portfolio Dashboard

Adding a centralised exchange account can be done with just the click of a few buttons. By navigating to the accounts section and centralised exchanges tab in the Portfolio Dashboard, organisations can click connect CeFi accounts.

Next, simply selecting the exchange they want to connect.

Lastly, connecting their relevant prime account with the passwords, API keys and relevant secret keys (depending on the exchange)

Connected account balances will be added to the Portfolio Dashboard token section, where we provide pricing and valuation of the asset.

All centralised exchange account assets will also be included within the daily snapshot valuations of the organisations.

Increasing access to more on-and-off chain data to come

As we continue to focus on providing access to any asset anywhere, we want to ensure we provide a truly holistic experience to users.

To date, we have focused on providing the most comprehensive access to DeFi and, this year, have expanded to alternative layer-1’s along with Bitcoin support. In our focus to ensure we are solving for the needs of institutions, we’ll continue to grow the depth of centralised exchange data, ensuring users can read but also eventually transact on any venue (both on the chain or off-chain) of their choice from within MMI.

Learn more about connecting CeFi to your MMI account here.

news.metaTitle: Centralised Exchange (CEX) Support Available on MMI
news.metaDescription: MetaMask Institutional continues to expand on-chain data access and now offers support to all EVM networks.

nodes.title: MetaMask feature update: Portfolio view on Extension
nodes.subtitle: One view to rule them all.

image.title: MetaMask feature update Portfolio view
image.description: MetaMask's new Portfolio view feature update lets you see all your tokens across all chains in a single view

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Managing your crypto should be easy. That’s why MetaMask’s new extension update lets you see all your tokens across all chains on the home screen. No more switching between different tabs and windows.

Portfolio view on MetaMask Extension makes it simple to organize your assets and understand your portfolio’s combined value. This means you can focus on the important things – like buying, swapping, and staking crypto.

Portfolio view is our latest update that lets you keep tabs on your crypto every step of the way. We’ve also redesigned transaction confirmations and signature requests, so you can clearly see what you’re actually signing. And to make sure you’re always staying safe, we’ll send you an alert when you’re interacting with a new address for the first time too.

TL;DR: we got you.

Download Metamask Extension to get started. Need more help? Head to MetaMask Support.

nodes.metaTitle: MetaMask feature update: Portfolio view on Extension
nodes.metaDescription: Manage your crypto effortlessly with MetaMask's Portfolio view. Organize all your tokens across all chains, and easily track your assets' combined value.

nodes.title: Layer3 x MetaMask: creating interactive experiences in the decentralized web
nodes.subtitle: Meet the builders who are transforming web3, in our More With MetaMask Partner Series.

image.title: MetaMask x Layer3: Creating interactive experiences in the decentralized web
image.description: MetaMask x Layer3: Creating interactive experiences in the decentralized web

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Layer3's mission is to help protocols grow and educate their ecosystems, while empowering people to explore and participate in diverse blockchain environments. Users are encouraged to actively engage, earning incentives and completing meaningful interactions across different protocols. This turns learning into a tangible, rewarding journey. With MetaMask acting as a secure gateway, Layer3 makes blockchain exploration accessible rather than a daunting challenge.

Transforming blockchain education with Layer3

Web3, aka the decentralized web, represents more than just a technological shift. It's a fundamental reimagining of digital interactions. Unlike traditional centralized systems, web3 offers true ownership, transparency, and user empowerment. However, the complexity of blockchain technologies has created a significant barrier to entry, preventing many from experiencing these revolutionary benefits.

Making web3 accessible and rewarding

Layer3 solves this critical problem by creating a guided, incentive-driven pathway into web3. Instead of overwhelming users with technical details, Layer3 breaks down blockchain interactions into understandable campaigns. A learn-by-doing approach transforms exploration into an adventure, where each interaction becomes a learning opportunity and every completed campaign brings tangible rewards.

MetaMask's role in blockchain exploration

MetaMask has been instrumental in this journey, providing the secure infrastructure that allows users to seamlessly interact with Layer3's platform. Its powerful wallet enables users to explore web3 with confidence, traversing different blockchains with ease. Since launching, Layer3 has connected over 4 million wallets, demonstrating how a learn-by-doing approach can make web3 accessible and exciting for users across the globe.

Connect your MetaMask wallet, and begin your first Layer3 campaign today.

nodes.metaDescription: Discover how Layer3 and MetaMask are transforming web3 user engagement. Explore and earn rewards through interactive campaigns.

nodes.title: How to swap crypto
nodes.subtitle: Thousands of tokens at your fingertips.

image.title: How to swap crypto with MetaMask
image.description: How to swap crypto with MetaMask

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Swapping crypto is fast, easy, and secure with MetaMask. You can choose from thousands of your favorite tokens across nine networks including Ethereum, Linea, Base, and Arbitrum. MetaMask Swaps also include gas fees right in your quotes, making swapping crypto as smooth as can be.

We've simplified cross-chain swapping too. Send&Swap lets you choose the token you want to spend and the token you want the other person to receive — all in one move. As ever, safety is essential when it comes to your digital assets. So rest easy. MetaMask Swaps are powered by our razor-tight, industry-leading security.

Below, you'll find step-by-step guides showing you how to swap crypto with MetaMask.

Let’s get into it! 🦊

How to swap crypto with MetaMask Extension

  1. Open the MetaMask browser extension.
  2. Select the network you want to swap on, and click the Swap button.
  3. Select the token you want to swap from. Example: ETH.
  4. Enter the amount that you want to swap.
  5. Select the token you want to swap to. Example: DAI.
  6. A preferred quote will be loaded automatically. To select a different quote, click View all quotes.
  7. Click Swap to confirm.

Success! 🦊

How to swap crypto with MetaMask App

  1. Sign-in to your MetaMask mobile app.
  2. Select the network you want to swap on, located at the top of your screen. Example: Ethereum Mainnet.
  3. Tap the menu button, which has two arrows in opposite directions and is located on the bottom of your homepage screen.
  4. Tap Swap.
  5. Select the token you want to swap from by tapping the token name that appears under your wallet address. Example: ETH.
  6. Enter the amount that you want to swap.
  7. Select the token you want to swap to. Example: DAI.
  8. Tap Get quotes to proceed. Note: you can manually select a different quote from our range of industry-leading providers.
  9. Tap Swap to confirm.

Success! 🦊

How to swap crypto with MetaMask Portfolio

  1. Connect your MetaMask wallet to portfolio.metamask.io
  2. Click Move crypto.
  3. Click Swap.
  4. Select the network you want to swap from in the dropdown menu. Example: Ethereum.
  5. Select the token you want to swap from. Example: ETH.
  6. Enter the amount that you want to swap.
  7. Select the token you want to swap to. Example: DAI.
  8. Click Get Quotes to proceed. Note: you can manually select a different quote from our range of industry-leading providers.
  9. Click Swap to confirm.

Success! 🦊

Ready to start swapping crypto? If you’re on desktop, download MetaMask Extension. If you’re on mobile, download MetaMask app for iOS or Android.

Need more help? We got you. Check out our MetaMask Support guide about swapping crypto.

nodes.metaDescription: Discover how to swap cryptocurrencies easily with MetaMask's self-custodial crypto wallet. Follow our step-by-step guide to securely exchange cryptocurrencies.
